name: Sloppy Joe Burgers
ingredients: 1/4 cup granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
6 slices American cheese, at room temperature

instructions.en: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients except cheese and coleslaw. Shape into 6 patties.
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej miske zmiešajte všetky prísady okrem syra a coleslaw. Vytvarujte 6 fašírok.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルにチーズとコールスローを除く全ての材料を入れて混ぜます。6つのパティを作ります。

instructions.en: Spray a very large nonstick skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high.
instructions.sk: Veľmi veľkú nepriľnavú panvicu postriekajte sprejom na varenie a zohrejte na stredne vysokom ohni.
instructions.ja: 大きな非粘着性フライパンに調理用スプレーをし、中高温で熱します。

instructions.en: Cook patties about 5 minutes per side or until done to your liking. If necessary, cook in batches of three.
instructions.sk: Fašírky opekajte asi 5 minút z každej strany alebo kým nie sú hotové podľa vašej chuti. Ak je to potrebné, opekajte v dávkach po tri.
instructions.ja: パティを片面約5分、またはお好みの焼き加減になるまで調理します。必要に応じて3つずつ調理します。

instructions.en: During the last 2 minutes of cooking, top each burger with a slice of cheese.
instructions.sk: Počas posledných 2 minút varenia položte na každý burger plátok syra.
instructions.ja: 調理の最後の2分間で、各バーガーにチーズスライスをのせます。
コールスローをのせて提供します。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Can be frozen without the toppings. Subtract 1 carb per serving if you use liquid Splenda.
